hpnRobot — Task planning simulation¶

The hpnRobot module implements classes and functions to simulate a navigation scenario consisting of one or more mobile robots that autonomously plan their motion from an initial state to a final state avoiding static obstacles and other robots, and respecting kinematic (including nonhonolonomic) constraints.


class hpnRobot.Fluent(value, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for implementing fluents. Intaces of fluents represent the subset of states such as, for each possible state in that subset, the fluent with the given arguments has value equals to the value argument
